column8: The Undead treasure these dull green flasks. Fill with Estus at bonfires, and drink to restore HP. The journey of an Undead has always traced the bonfires, and no journey of import has been made without an Estus Flask
Medicinal pellet made from crushed insects. The red type temporarily boosts fire damage absorption.
Throw at enemies to deal fire damage.
Medicinal purple moss clump. Reduces poison build-up. Cures poison.
